definition: tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)
tube-shaped object/tube/bobbin/(Internet slang) homonym for 同志[tong2 zhi4]

sentences.english: This information will be used to help determine the cement slurry specifications for both the dump bailer and cement packer.

sentences.english: Extruder barrel and die temperatures must be set properly for each product.

sentences.english: Discharging process of slate valve has been studied in this paper.

sentences.english: The plates around the anchor chain bell mouth and rudder horn shall be strengthened.

sentences.english: Overshot parts are usually covered with grease lest they should rust.
